Plays the sound "weapon/sigilcharge" on the Weapon channel, and takes 8 health points from the p..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_FireSigil2'''
(''no parameter'')
Plays the sound "weapon/sigilcharge" on the Weapon channel, and takes 8 health points from the player. The function then fires a {{Class|SpectralLightningH1}}. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Sigil}} and derived classes.
